task-wr.title: Enabling Multi-queue Support for virtio NICs
task-wr.shortdesc: You can enable multi-queue support for enhanced throughput on virtio interfaces by setting a property on the associated image.

context.p: US79271 new topicWhen multi-queue support is enabled, guests can scale the network performance as the number of guest vCPUs increases. This is because the vCPUs can transmit and receive packets in parallel as they each have their own queues. Without multi-queue, there is only one receive and transmit queue shared amongst all the vCPUs.

step.cmd: Use the glance image-update command to update the property for the image.

info.p: where image_name is the name of the image.
